feed.title: Slink Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Slink: v1.5.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Completely redesigned UI/UX
  • Improved image processing performance
  • Added basic search to quickly find users and posts on explore page
  • Introduced hashtagging to organize and explore content
  • Other minor bug fixes and stability improvements

Full Changelog: https://github.com/andrii-kryvoviaz/slink/compare/v1.4.9...v1.5.0

entry.title: New release for Slink: v1.5.1
entry.content:
Release Notes

  • Fixed: User pagination in the admin panel
  • Added: allowOnlyPublicImages setting to disable private images
  • Improved: UI/UX with skeleton components for loading states in Explore and History pages, and integrated a new scrolling for smoother layout and navigation

Full Changelog: https://github.com/andrii-kryvoviaz/slink/compare/v1.5.0...v1.5.1

entry.title: New release for Slink: v1.6.0
entry.content:
üì¶ Release Notes

üöÄ New Features

  • Enabled image uploads without authentication via Guest Upload Functionality, configurable in admin settings.
  • Admins can now change visibility and delete public images.
  • Added API Key Management allowing users to generate and manage personal upload keys.
  • Introduced ShareX Integration for seamless direct uploads using API keys.
  • Introduced an Upload Page shortcut in the Navbar for quick access.

üõ†Ô∏è Improvements & Fixes

  • Fixed issues with settings not applying for unauthenticated users.
  • Improved stability of the admin settings page.

Full Changelog: https://github.com/andrii-kryvoviaz/slink/compare/v1.5.1...v1.6.0

entry.title: New release for Slink: v1.6.1
entry.content:
Enables url and thumbnailUrl links for ShareX integration.

Full Changelog: https://github.com/andrii-kryvoviaz/slink/compare/v1.6.0...v1.6.1
